divy37:2: buddho bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe |
divy37:4: yadā pāṭaliputraṁ saṁvartate, tadā rorukaṁ vivartate |
divy37:5: roruke mahānagare rudrāyaṇo nāma rājā rājyaṁ kārayati ṛddhaṁ ca sphītaṁ ca kṣemaṁ ca subhikṣaṁ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṁ ca |
divy37:9: tasya candraprabhā nāma devī, śikhaṇḍī putraḥ kumāraḥ, hirubhirustasyāgrāmātyau |
divy37:10: rājagṛhe rājā bimbisāro rājyaṁ kārayati ṛddhaṁ ca sphītaṁ ca kṣemaṁ ca subhikṣaṁ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṁ ca |
divy37:11: tasya vaidehī mahādevī, ajātaśatruḥ putraḥ kumāraḥ, varṣakāro brāhmaṇo magadhamahāmātyo ’grāmātyaḥ |
divy37:16: atha rājā rudrāyaṇo ’mātyagaṇaparivṛto ’mātyānāmantrayate—bhavantaḥ, asti kasyacidanyasyāpi rājña evamavidhā janapadā ṛddhāśca sphītāśca kṣemāṣca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyāśca? sadāpuṣpaphalavṛkṣāh? devaḥ kālena kālaṁ samyagvāridhārāmanuprayacchati? atīva śasyasampattirbhavati? te vaṇijaḥ kathayanti—asti deva pūrvadeśe rājagṛhaṁ nagaram |
divy37:17: tatra rājā bimbisāro rājyaṁ kārayati ṛddhaṁ ca sphītaṁ ca kṣemaṁ ca subhikṣaṁ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṁ ca |
divy37:22: so ’mātyānāmantrayate—kiṁ bhavantastasya rājño durlabham? te kathayanti—devo ratnādhipatiḥ, sa rājā vastrādhipatiḥ |
divy37:24: tena tasya ratnānāṁ peṭāṁ pūrayitvā prābhṛtamanupreṣitaṁ lekhaśca dattah—priyavayasya, tvaṁ mamādṛṣṭasakhā |
divy37:25: yadā tava kiṁcid roruke nagare karaṇīyaṁ bhavati, mama lekho dātavyaḥ |
divy37:27: te taṁ prābhṛtamādāya yena rājagṛhaṁ tena prakrāntāḥ |
divy37:29: taiḥ sā ratnapeṭā rājño bimbisārasyopanāmitā lekhaśca |
divy37:30: rājā bimbisāro lekhaṁ vācayitvā amātyānāmantrayate—kiṁ bhavantastadrājño durlabham? amātyāḥ kathayanti—devo vastrādhipatiḥ, sa rājā ratnādhipatiḥ |
divy37:32: tena tasya mahārhāṇāṁ vastrāṇāṁ vastrāṇāṁ peṭāṁ pūrayitvā prābhṛtamanupreṣitaṁ lekhaśca dattah—priyavayasya, tvaṁ mamādṛṣṭasakhā |
divy37:33: yatkiṁcittava rājagṛhe prayojanaṁ bhavati, mama lekho dātavyaḥ |
divy37:35: te taṁ prābhṛtamādāya yena rorukaṁ tena prakrāntāḥ |
divy37:37: taiḥ sā vastrapeṭā rājño rudtāyaṇasyopanāmitā lekhaṣca |
divy37:40: so ’mātyānāmantrayate—bhavantaḥ, kīdṛśastasya rājño ānāhapariṇāhah? te kathayanti—yādṛśa eva devasya, api tu sa rājā svayaṁ prahartā |
divy37:41: 465.030 prātisīmaiḥ kīdṛśaṁ rajabhiḥ sārdhaṁ saṁgrāmayati? rudrāyaṇasya rājño maṇivarma pañcāṅgepetośītam uṣṇasaṁsparśamuṣṇe śootasaṁsparśaṁ duśchedaṁ durbhedaṁ viṣaghnamavabhāsātmakaṁ ca |
divy37:42: tena tasya taṁ prābhṛtamanupreṣitam lekhaśca dattah—priyavayasya, idaṁ mayā ca tava maṇivarma prābhṛtamanupreṣitaṁ pañcāṅgopetaṁ śīte uṣṇasaṁsparśamuṣṇe śītasaṁsparśaṁ duśchedaṁ durbhedaṁ viṣaghnamavabhāsātmakam |
divy37:44: sa dūtastanmaṇivarma ādāya lekhaṁ ca, yena rājagṛhaṁ tena prakrāntaḥ |
divy37:50: dharmatā khalu yasya na śakyate mūlyaṁ kartum, tasyaikaikasya koṭimūlyaṁ kriyate |
divy37:51: rājā bimbisāro vyathitaḥ kathayati—kiṁ mayā tasya prābhṛtamanupreṣitavyaṁ bhaviṣyati? sa saṁlakṣayati—ayaṁ buddho bhagavān |
divy37:55: upasaṁkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ |
divy37:56: rājā bimbisāro bhagavantamidamavocat—roruke bhadanta nagare rājā rudrāyaṇo nāma prativasati mamādṛṣṭasakhā |
divy37:58: ahaṁ tasya kiṁ prābhṛtamanupraṣeyāmi? bhagavānāha—tathāgatapratimāṁ paṭe likhāpayitvā prābhṛtamanupreṣaya |
divy37:62: te kathayanti—yadi devo bhagavantamantargṛhe bhojayet, evaṁ svayaṁ saṁjñāpaya bhagavato nimittamudgrahītum |
divy37:65: te yamevāvayavaṁ bhagavataḥ paśyanti, tameva paśyanto na tṛptiṁ gacchanti |
divy37:67: bhagavānāha—mahārāja, khedamāpatsyante, na śakyate tathāgatasya nimittamudgrahītum |
divy37:70: tatra bhagavatā chāyā utsṛṣṭā, uktāśca—raṅgaiḥ pūrayata |
divy37:73: gāthādvayaṁ ca likitavyam— ārabhadhvaṁ niṣkrāmata yujyadhvaṁ buddhaśāsane |
divy37:77: yadi kathayati—kimidam? vaktavyam—iyamabhyupapattiriyaṁ śikṣā iyaṁ lokasaṁvṛtiriyamatyutsāhatā |
divy37:79: bhagavatā rājā bimbisāra uktah—mahārāja, rudrāyaṇasya lekhamanuprayaccha—priyavaysya, idaṁ te mayā trailokyaprativiśiṣṭaṁ prābhṛtamanupreṣitam |
divy37:80: asya tvayā ardhatṛtīyāni yojanāni mārgaśobhā kartavyam |
divy37:82: vistīrṇāvakāśe pradeśe sthāpayitvā mahatīṁ pūjāṁ satkāraṁ kṛtvodghāṭayitavyam |
divy37:84: rājñā bimbisāreṇa yathāsaṁdiṣṭaṁ lekho likhitvā saṁpreṣitaḥ |
divy37:88: so ’mātyānāṁ kathayati—bhavantaḥ, kīdṛśaṁ mama tena prabhṛtamanupreṣitam yasya satkāraḥ kartavyo bhaviṣyati? saṁnāhayata caturaṅgabalakāyam |
divy37:91: na śakyaṁ tena yadvā tadvā pratiprābhṛtamanupreṣayitum |
divy37:93: yadi devasya na cittaparitoṣo bhaviṣyati, tatra kālajñā bhaviṣyāmaḥ |
divy37:97: vistīrṇāvakāśe pradeśe sthāpayitvā mahatīṁ pūjāṁ kṛtvoddhāṭitā |
divy37:99: tairbuddhapratimāṁ dṛṣṭvā ekaraveṇa nādo muktah—namo buddhāyeti |
divy37:100: tasya buddha ityaśrutapūrvaṁ ghoṣaṁ śrutvā sarvaromakūpāṇyāhṛṣṭāni |
divy37:101: sa kathayati—ka eṣa bhavanto buddho nāma? te kathayanti—deva, śākyānāṁ kumāra utpanno ’sti himavatpārśve nadyā bhāgīrathyāstīre kapilasya ṛṣerāśramapadasya nātidūre |
divy37:103: sacedgṛhī agāramadhyāvasiṣyati, rājā bhaviṣyati cakravartī caturaṅgairvijetā dhārmiko dharmarājaḥ saptaratnasamanvāgataḥ |
divy37:104: tasyemānyevamrūpāṇi saptaratnāni bhavanti, tadyathā—cakraratnaṁ hastiratnamaśvaratnaṁ maṇiratnaṁ strīratnaṁ gṛhapatiratnaṁ pariṇāyakaratnameva saptamam |
divy37:105: pūrṇaṁ cāsya bhaviṣyati sahasraṁ putrāṇāṁ śūrāṇāṁ vīrāṇāṁ varāṅgarūpiṇāṁ parasainyapramardakānām |
divy37:106: sa imāmeva samudraparyantāṁ mahāpṛthvīṁkhilāmalaṇṭakāmanutpīḍāmadaṇḍenāśastreṇa dharmeṇa śamenābhinirjitya adhyāvasiṣyati |
divy37:107: sacet keśaśmaśrūṇyavatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇyācchādya samyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṁ pravrajiṣyati, tathāgato bhaviṣyatyarhan samyaksambuddho vighuṣṭaśabdo loke |
divy37:116: atha rudrāyaṇo rājā sāmātyaḥ pratyūṣasamaye sarvārthān sarvakarmāntān pratiprasrabhya niṣaṇṇaḥ paryaṅkamābhujya ṛjukāyaṁ praṇidhāya pratimukhāṁ smṛtimupasthāpya |
divy37:117: sa imameva dvādaśāṅgaṁ pratītyasamutpādamanulomapratilomaṁ vyavalokayati, yaduta asmin satīdaṁ bhavati, asyotpādādidamutpadyate yaduta avidyāpratyayāḥ saṁskārā yāvatsamudayo nirodhaśca bhavati |
divy37:118: tenemaṁ dvādaśāṅgaṁ pratītyasamutpādamanulomapratilomaṁ vyavalokayatā viṁśatiśikharasamudgataṁ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṁ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā srotāpattiphalaṁ sākṣātkṛtam |
divy37:119: sa dṛṣṭasatyo gāthāṁ bhāṣate— bhūratnena hi buddhena prajñācakṣurviśodhitam |
divy37:121: tena rājño bimbisārasya saṁdiṣṭam—priyavayasya, tvāmāgamya mayodddhṛto narakatiryakpretebhyaḥ pādaḥ, pratiṣṭhāpito devamanuṣyeṣu |
divy37:122: ucchoṣitā rudhirāśrusamudrāḥ, laṅghitā asthiparvatāḥ, anādikālopacitaṁ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṁ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā srotāpattiphalaṁ sākṣātkṛtam |
divy37:125: atha sa rājā bimbisāro yena bhagavāṁstenopasaṁkrāntaḥ |
divy37:126: upasaṁkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ |
divy37:127: ekāntaniṣaṇṇo bhagavantamidamavocat—rudrāyaṇena bhadanta rājñā satyāni dṛṣṭāni |
divy37:129: bhagavān saṁlakṣayati—katamasya bhikṣo rudrāyaṇo rājā saparivāro vineyo rairukanivāsī ca janakāyah? kātyāyanasya bhikṣoḥ |
divy37:130: tatra bhgavānāyuṣmantaṁ mahākātyāyanamāmantrayate—samanvāhara kātyāyana rauruke nagare rudrāyaṇaṁ rājānaṁ saparivāraṁ raurukanivāsinaṁ ca janakāyam |
divy37:133: athāyuṣmān mahākātyāyanastasyā eva rātryā atyayātpūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya rājagṛhaṁ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat |
divy37:134: rājagṛhaṁ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrāntaḥ paribhuktaṁ śayanaṁ pratiśāmya samādāya pātracīvaraṁ pañcaśataparivāro yena raurukaṁ tena cārikāṁ prakrāntaḥ |
divy37:136: priyavayasya, eṣa te bhikṣurmayā śāstṛkalpo mahāśrāvako ’nupreṣitaḥ |
divy37:137: asya tvayārdhatṛtīyāni yojanāni mārgaśobhā kartavyā nagaraśobhā ca |
divy37:143: tenārdhatṛtīyāni yojanāni mārgaśobhā kṛtā, nagaraśobhā kṛtā, pañca vihāraśatāni, yena ekajanasahasraparivāreṇa ca svayameva pratyudgamya mahatā satkāreṇa rorukaṁ nagaraṁ praveśitaḥ |
divy37:144: bahir nagarasya pañca vihāraśatāni kāritāni, pañca mañcapīṭhavṛṣikoccakabimbopadhānacaturasrakaśatāni dāpitāni, pañca piṇḍapātaśatāni prajñaptāni, vistīrṇāvakāśe ca pṛthivīpradeśe āsanaprajñaptiḥ kāritā |
divy37:145: ayuṣmān mahākātyāyanaḥ purastād bhikṣusaṁghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ |
divy37:148: tata āyuṣmatā mahākātyāyanena tasyāḥ pariṣada āśayānuśayaṁ dhātuṁ prakṛtiṁ ca jñātvā tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā, yāṁ śrutvā anekaiḥ prāṇiśatasahasrairmahāviśeṣo ’dhigataḥ |
divy37:149: kaiścicchrotāpattiphalam, kaiścidnāgāmiphalam, kaiścitpravrahya sarvalkeśaprahāṇādarhattvaṁ sākṣātkṛtam, kaiścicchrāvakabodhau cittānyutpāditāni, kaiścitpratyekāyāṁ bodhau, kaiścidanuttarāyāṁ samyaksambodhau |
divy37:150: yadbhūyasā sā pariṣadbuddhaniṁnā dharmapravaṇā saṁghaprāgbhārā vyavasthāpitā |
divy37:152: rauruke nagare tiṣyaḥ puṣyaśca gṛhapatī vasataḥ |
divy37:154: upasaṁkramya āyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇau |
divy37:155: tiṣyapuṣyau gṛhapatī āyuṣmantaṁ mahākātyāyanamidamavocatām—labhevahi āryamahākātyāyana svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṁ bhikṣubhāvam |
divy37:158: tābhyām yujyamānābhyāṁ vyāyacchamānābhyāṁ ghaṭamānābhyāmidameva pañcagaṇḍakaṁ saṁsāracakraṁ calācalam viditvā sarvasaṁskāragatīḥ śataśaḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṁsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṁ sākṣātkṛtam |
divy37:159: arhantau saṁvṛttau traidhātukavīrāgau samaloṣṭakāñcanāvākāśapāṇisamacittau vāsīcandanakalpau vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośau vidyābhijñāpratisaṁvitprāptau bhvalābhalobhasatkāraparānmukhau |
divy37:160: sendropendrāṇāṁ devānāṁ pūjyau mānyavabhivādyau ca saṁvṛttau |
divy37:161: tau jvalanatapanavarṣaṇavidyotanaprātihāryāṇi kṛtvā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtau |
divy37:162: tayorjñātṛbhiḥ śarīrapūjāṁ kṛrtvā dvau stūpau kāritau—ekastiṣyasya, dvitīyaḥ puṇyasya |
divy37:164: rudrāyaṇo rājā dine dine āyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasyāntikād dharmaṁ śrutvā antaḥpurasyārocayati—āryo mahākātyāyano madhuramadhuraṁ dharmaṁ deśayati kṣaudramiva madhuraṁ praprīṇayatīti |
divy37:167: yadyevam, yūyaṁ kasmāñ śṛṇutha? deva, vayaṁ hrīmantyaḥ |
divy37:168: kathaṁ vayaṁ tatra gatvā dharmaṁ śṛṇumah? yadyāryo mahākātyāyana ihaivāgatya dharmaṁ deśayet, evaṁ vayamapi śṛṇuyām iti |
divy37:169: rudrāyaṇena rājñā āyuṣmān mahākātyāyana uktah—mama ārya sāntaḥpuramicchati śrotum |
divy37:170: sa kathayati—mahārāja, na bhikṣavo ’ntaḥpuraṁ praviśya dharmaṁ deśayanti |
divy37:172: ārya, atra ko ’ntaḥpurasya dharmaṁ deśayati? mahārāja, bhikṣuṇyaḥ |
divy37:173: rudrāyaṇarājñā bimbisārasya rājño lekho ’nupreṣitah—priyavayasya, antaḥpuramicchati dharmaṁ śrotum |
divy37:175: bimbisāro rājā taṁ lekhaṁ vācayitvā yena bhagvāṁstenopasaṁkrāntaḥ |
divy37:176: upasaṁkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ |
divy37:177: ekāntaniṣaṇṇo rājā bimbisāro bhagavantamidamavocat—rudrāyaṇena bhagavan rājñā lekho ’nupreṣitah—antaḥpuramicchati dharmaṁ śrotum |
divy37:179: tadatra kathaṁ pratipattavyamiti? bhagavān saṁlakṣayati—katarasyā bhikṣuṇyā rudrāyaṇasya rājño antaḥpuraparijano vineyo raurukanivāsī ca strījana iti? paśyati śailāyā bhikṣuṇyāḥ |
divy37:180: tatra bhagavāñchailāṁ bhikṣuṇīmāmantrayate—samanvāhara śaile rauruke nagare rudrāyaṇasya rājño ’ntaḥpurajanaṁ raurukanivāsinaṁ strījanamiti |
divy37:181: evaṁ bhadanteti śailā bhikṣuṇī bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato ’ntikāt prakrāntā |
divy37:182: atha śailā bhikṣuṇī tasyā eva rātrertyayātpūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya rājagṛhaṁ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhakrakṛtyā pañcādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrāntā yathāparibhuktaṁ śayanāsanaṁ pratisamayya samādāya pātracīvaraṁ pañcaśataparivārā yena raurukaṁ nagaraṁ tena cārikāṁ prakrāntā |
divy37:183: bimbisāreṇa ca rājñā rudrāyaṇasya rājño lekho ’nupreṣitah—priyavayasya, eṣā te mayā mahāśrāvikā śāstrānugatā pañcaśataparivārā preṣitā |
divy37:184: asyāṁ tvayārdharṛtīyāni yojanāni mārgaśobhā kartavyā nagaraśobhā ca |
divy37:186: abhyantare ca nagarasya pañca vihāraśatāni kārayitavyāni, pañca mañcapīṭhaśatāni, vṛṣikoccabimbopadhānacaturasrakaśatāni dātavyāni, pañca piṇḍapātaśatāni prajñāpayitavyāni |
divy37:188: rudrāyaṇena rājñā lekhaṁ vācayitvā prāmodyajātenārdhatṛtīyāni yojanāni mārgaśobhā kāritā |
divy37:189: anekajanasahasraparivāreṇa ca svayameva pratyudgamya mahatā satkāreṇa raurukaṁ nagaraṁ praveśitā |
divy37:190: abhyantare ca nagarasya pañca vihāraśatāni kāritāni, pañca mañcapīṭhavṛṣikoṣabimbopadhānacaturasrakaśatāni dāpitāni, pañca piṇḍapātaśatāni prajñaptāni |
divy37:191: śailā bhikṣuṇī rudrāyaṇasya rājño ’ntaḥpuraṁ praviśya dine dinai dharmaṁ deśayati |
divy37:192: rudrāyaṇo rājā vīṇāyāṁ kṛtāvī, candraprabhā devī nṛtye |
divy37:193: yāvadapareṇa samayena rudrāyaṇo rājā vīṇāṁ vādayati, candraprabhā devī nṛtyati |
divy37:197: candraprabhā devī kathayati—deva, mā mayā durnṛtyam? devi, na tvayā dunṛtyam |
divy37:198: api tu mayā tava nṛtyantyā vināśalakṣaṇaṁ dṛṣṭam—saptame divase tava kālatriyā bhavatīti |
divy37:199: candraprabhā devī pādayor nipatya kathayati—deva yadyevam, kṛtopasthānāhaṁ devasya |
divy37:202: yadi tāvatpravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṁ sākṣātkaroṣi, eṣa eva te duḥkhāntaḥ |
divy37:203: atha sāvaśeṣasamyojanā kālaṁ kṛtvā deveṣūpapadyase, devabhūtayā te mamopadarśayitavyamiti |
divy37:205: sā rudrāyaṇena rājñā śailāyā bhikṣuṇyāḥ samarpitā—āryacandraptabhā devī ākāṅkṣati svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṁ bhikcuṇībhāvam |
divy37:211: sā saptame divase kālagatā cāturmahārājikeṣu deveṣūpapannā |
divy37:212: dharmatā khalu devaputrasya vā devakanyāyā vā aciropapannasya, trīṇi cittānyutpadyante—kutaścyutaḥ, kutropapannaḥ, kena karmaṇeti |
divy37:215: kena karmaṇā? bhagavataḥ śāsane brāhmacaryaṁ caritveti |
divy37:216: tasyā etadabhavat—tadapratirūpaṁ syādyadahaṁ paryuṣitaparivāsā bhagavantaṁ darśanāyopasaṁkramitum |
divy37:218: atha candraprabhā devakanyā calavimalakuṇḍaladharā hārārdhahāravibhūṣitagātrī tāmeva rātrīṁ divyānāmutpalakumudapuṇḍarīkamāndāravāṇāmutsaṅgaṁ pūrayitvā sarvaṁ veṇuvanaṁ kalandakakanivāpamudāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya bhagavantaṁ puṣpairavakīrya bhagavataḥ purastānniṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya |
divy37:219: bhagavatā tasyā āśayānuśayaṁ dhātuṁ prakṛtiṁ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasamprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā, yāṁ śrutvā candraprabhayā devakanyayā viṁśatiśikharasamudgataṁsatkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṁ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā śrotāpattiphalaṁ sākṣātkṛtam |
divy37:220: sā dṛṣṭasatyā trirudānamudānayati—idamasmākaṁ bhadanta, na mātrā kṛtaṁ na pitrā kṛtaṁ na rājñā na devatābhir neṣṭair nasvajanabandhuvargair na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇairyadbhagavatāsmākaṁ kṛtam |
divy37:221: ucchoṣitā rudhirāśrusamudrāḥ, laṅghitā asthiparvatāḥ, pihitānyapāyadvārāṇi, vivṛtāni svargamokṣadvārāṇi, pratiṣṭāpitā devamanuṣyeṣu |
divy37:222: āha ca— tavānubhāvātpihitaḥ sughoro hyapāyamārgo bahuduḥkhayuktaḥ |
divy37:225: prāptaṁ ca śāntaṁ padamāryakāntaṁ tīrṇaśca duḥkhārṇavapāramasmi (5)|
divy37:228: avanamya tataḥ pralambahārā caraṇau dvāvabhivandya jāraharṣā |
divy37:229: parigamya pradakṣiṇaṁ jitāriṁ suralokābhimukhī divaṁ jagāma (7)|
divy37:230: atha candraprabhā devakanyā vaṇigiva labdhalābhaḥ, sasyasampanna iva karṣakaḥ, śūra iva vijitasaṁgrāmaḥ, sarvarogaparimukta ivāturaḥ, yayā vibhūtyā bhagavatsakāśāmāgatā tayaiva vibhūtyā svarbhavanaṁ saṁprasthitā |
divy37:232: atha candraprabhā devakanyā yena rājā rudrāyaṇastenopasaṁkrāntā |
divy37:233: tena khalu samayena rudrāyaṇo rājā ekākī gṛhasyoparitalake śayitaḥ |
divy37:234: sa tayā udārāvabhāsaṁ kṛtvā acchaṭāśabdena pratibodhitaḥ |
divy37:235: sa middhāvasthalocanāparisphuṭo ’vijñātaḥ kathayati—kā tvamiti? sā kathayati—ahaṁ candraprabheti |
divy37:237: sā kathayati—deva, cyutāhaṁ kālagatā cāturmahārājikeṣu deveṣūpapannā |
divy37:238: yadīcchasi mayā sārdhaṁ samāgamam, bhagavato ’ntike pravraja |
divy37:239: yadi tāvaddṛṣṭadharmā sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṁ sākṣātkariṣyase, sa eva te ’nto dukhasya |
divy37:240: atha sāvaśeṣasamyojanaḥ, kālaṁ kṛtvā cārturmahārājikeṣu deveṣūpapatsyase |
divy37:241: tatra te mayā sārdhaṁ samāgamo bhaviṣyati |
divy37:243: rudrāyaṇo rājā kṛtsnāṁ rātriṁ pravrajyāmanuvicintayan kālyamevotthāya amātyānāmantrayate—paśyata bhavantaḥ, candraprabhā devī kva tiṣṭhatīti? te kathayanti—deva, kālagateti |
divy37:244: rudrāyaṇaḥ saṁlakṣayati—na mama pratirūpaṁ syādyadahaṁ devatācodito ’ham agāramadhyāvaseyam |
divy37:246: yannvahaṁ śikhaṇḍinaṁ kumāraṁ rājye ’bhiṣicya keśaśmaśrūṇyavatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇyācchādya samyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṁ pravrajeyamiti |
divy37:247: tena hirubhirukāvagrāmātyau ddutanāhūtoktau bhavantau, yādṛśa eva mama śikhaṇḍī kumāraḥ putraḥ, tādṛśa eva yuvayoḥ |
divy37:248: sa eṣa yuvābhyāmahitānnivārayitavyo hite ca saṁniyojayitavyaḥ |
divy37:251: śikhaṇḍyapi kumāro ’bhihitah—putra, yathaiva tvaṁ mama vacanaṁ śrotavyaṁ kartavyaṁ manyase, tathā anayorapi hirubhirukayoragrāmātyayorvacanaṁ śrotavyaṁ kartavyaṁ manyathāḥ |
divy37:254: tato rudrāyaṇena rājñā rauruke nagare ghaṇṭāvadhoṣaṇaṁ kāritam—śṛṇvantu bhavanto raurukanivāsinaḥ paurā nānādeśābhyāgataśca janakāyaḥ |
divy37:255: ahaṁ keśaśmaśrūṇyavatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇyācchādya samyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṁ pravrajiṣyāmi |
divy37:256: bhūyaśaḥ putramāha—putra, tvayā rājyaṁ kārayatā kasyacidaparādhyaṁ na kṣantavyamiti |
divy37:258: śrutvā sarva eva raurukanivāsī janakāyo ’nyaśca nānādeśābhyāgātaḥ sāśrukaṇṭho vyavasthitaḥ |
divy37:259: tato rudrāyaṇo rājā śikhaṇḍinaṁ kumāraṁ rājye pratiṣṭhāpya bandhujanaṁ kṣamāpayitvā śramaṇabrāhmaṇakṛpaṇavanīpakebhyo dānāni datvā paṇyāni kṛtvā ekena puruṣeṇopasthāyakena rājagṛhābhimukhah samprasthitah |
divy37:260: tataḥ śikhaṇḍī rājā sāntaḥpurāmātyapaurajanapado ’nyaśca nānādeśābhyāgato janakāyaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhaḥ |
divy37:261: so ’nekaiḥ praṇiśatasahasrairanugamyamāno raurukānnagarānniṣkramya anyatamāsminnudyāne vividhataruṣaṇḍamaṇḍite nānāpuṣpasalilasampanne haṁsakroñcamayūraśukasārikākokilajīvaṁjīvakanirghoṣite muhūrtamāsthāya raurukaṁ nagaramavalokya śikhaṇḍinaṁ rājānamāmantrayate—putra, mayā dharmeṇa rājyaṁ kāritam, yena me iyanti praṇiśatasahasrāṇi pṛṣṭhato ’nuvaddhāni |
divy37:263: so ’pi janakāyaḥ samāśvāsyoktah—bhavantaḥ, eṣa yuṣmākaṁ rājā samanuyukto mayā |
divy37:265: rājā śikhaṇḍī sāntaḥpurakumārāmātyapaurajanapado ’śruparuyākulekṣaṇo muhūrmuhūr nivartya nirīkṣamāṇo raurukaṁ nagaraṁ pratinivṛttaḥ |
divy37:266: tato rudrāyaṇo rājā anupūrveṇa rājagṛhaṁ nagaramanuprāptaḥ |
divy37:267: tenodyāne sthitvā sa puruṣa uktah—gaccha bhoḥ puruṣa, rājño bimbisārasya gatvā nivedaya—rudrāyaṇo nāma udyāne tiṣṭhatīti |
divy37:268: tena puruṣeṇa gatvā rājño bimbisārasya niveditam—deva, rudrāyaṇo rājā udyāane tiṣṭhatīti, sa rājā śrutvā sahasaivotthitaḥ pauruṣānāmantrayate—bhavantaḥ, mahāsādhano rājā apratisaṁvidita evāgataḥ |
divy37:269: na yuṣmākaṁ kenacidvijñāt iti? sa kathayati—deva, kuto ’sya sādhanam? ātmanā dvitīya āgata iti |
divy37:270: rājā bimbisāraḥ saṁlakṣayati—na mama pratirūpaṁ syādyadahaṁ rāhānaṁ kṣatriyaṁ mūrdhnāmiṣiktamevameva praveśayeyam |
divy37:271: mahatā satkāreṇa praveśayāmīti viditvā mārgaśobhāṁ bagaraśobhāṁ ca kārayitvā caturaṅgena balakāyena pratyudgataḥ |
divy37:272: kaṇṭhe pariṣvajya hastiskandhe āropya rājagṛhaṁ mahānagaraṁ praveśitaḥ |
divy37:275: mārgaśrame prativinodite uktah—priyavayasya, sphītaṁ rājyamapāsya antaḥpuraṁ kumārānāmātyān paurajanapadān kimihāgamanaprayojanam? mā kenacidbhūmyantareṇa rājñā rāṣṭrāvamardanaḥ kṛtah? kumāreṇa vā kenacidduṣṭāmātyavigrāhitena rājyābhinandinā parākrāntamiti? sa kathayati—vayasya, ākaṅkṣāmi svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṁ bhikṣubhāvam |
divy37:276: iti śrutvā rājā bimbisāra āttamanāḥ pūrvakāyamabhyunnamayya dakṣiṇabāhumābhiprasāryodānamudānayati—aho buddhaḥ, aho dharmaḥ, aho saṁghah aho dharmasya svākhyātatā, yatredānīmevaṁvidhāḥ puruṣāḥ sphītaṁ rājyamapahāya sphītamantaḥpuraṁ vistīrṇasvajanabandhuvargaṁ sphītāni ca kośakoṣṭhāgārāṇyapahāya ākāṅkṣante svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṁ bhikṣubhāvam |
divy37:277: ityuktvā rājānaṁ rudrāyaṇaṁ samādāya yena bhagavāṁsetnopasaṁkrāntaḥ |
divy37:278: tena khalu samayena bhagavānanekaśatāyā bhikṣuparṣadaḥ purastānniṣaṇṇo dharmaṁ deśayati |
divy37:279: adrākṣīdbhagavān rājānaṁ māgadhaṁ śreṇyaṁ bimbisāraṁ dūrādeva |
divy37:280: dṛṣṭvā ca punarbhikṣūnāmantrayate sma—eṣa bhikṣavo rājā bimbisāraḥ saprābhṛta āgacchati |
divy37:283: rājā bimbisāro bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ |
divy37:284: ekāntaniṣaṇṇo rājā biṁvisāro bhagavantamidamavocat—ayaṁ bhadanta rājā rudrāyaṇa ākāṅkṣate svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṁ bhikṣubhāvam |
divy37:286: sa bhagavatā ehibhikṣukayā ābhāṣitah—ehi bhikṣo, cara brāhmacaryamiti |
divy37:287: sa bhagavato vācāvasāne eva muṇḍaḥ saṁvṛttaḥ saṁghāṭīprāvṛtaḥ pātrakaravyagrahasto varṣaśatopasampannasya bhikṣorīryāpathenāvasthitaḥ |
divy37:289: ehīti coktaḥ sa tathāgatena muṇḍaśca saṁghāṭiparivṛtadehaḥ |
divy37:290: sadyaḥ praśāntendraya eva tasthau evaṁ sthito buddho manorathena (8)|
divy37:291: āyuṣmān rudrāyaṇaḥ pūrvāhne nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya rājagṛhaṁ piṇṭāya prāvikṣat |
divy37:293: eṣa ca śabdo rājagṛhe nagare samantato visṛtah—rudrāyaṇo rājā bhagavatā pravrajitaḥ, sa rājagṛhaṁ bhikṣārthī praviṣṭaḥ |
divy37:296: amātyai rājño bimbisārasya niveditam—deva, rudrāyaṇo rājā rājagṛhaṁ piṇḍāya praviṣṭo ’nekaiḥ prāṇiśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtastiṣṭhatīti |
divy37:297: śrutvā ca punā rājā bimbisāro yena rudrāyaṇo bhikṣustenopasaṁkrāntaḥ |
divy37:298: upasaṁkramya rudrāyaṇaṁ bhikṣumidamavocat— bhuktvā grāmasahasrāṇi raurukaṁ ca narādhipa |
divy37:300: bhuktvā śatapale pātre sauvarṇe rājate ’tha vā |
divy37:315: koṣṭhāgārāṇi kośaṁ ca bahuvittaṁ prahāya vai |
divy37:321: rājā bimbisāraḥ prāha— kiṁ nu tvaṁ durmanā rājan kiṁ dīna iva bhāṣase |
divy37:323: kiṁ nu tvaṁ durmanā rāhan kiṁ dīna iva bhāṣase |
divy37:326: rudrāyaṇa prāha— na rājan kṛpaṇo loke dharmakāyena saṁspṛśet |
divy37:330: śṛṇu me tvaṁ mahārāja dharmatā deśayāmyaham |
divy37:331: śrutvā dharmaṁ tato jñeyo yadi tvaṁ prītimeṣyasi (23)|
divy37:335: trīṭā tatra ratiḥ kā vā putraparadhaneṣu vā (25)|
divy37:337: śaurā dhanaṁ prārthayante rājan mukto ’smi bandhanāt (26)|
divy37:338: na bhaiṣajyāni trāyante na dhanaṁ jñātayo na ca |
divy37:339: na sarvavidyā na balaṁ na śauryaṁ trāyate ’ntakāt (27) devāpi santīha mahānubhāvāḥ sthānecvihocceṣu cirāyuṣo ’pi |
divy37:340: āyuḥkṣayānte ’pi tataścyavante mucyeta ko neha śarīrabhedāt (28)|
divy37:341: rājyāni kṛtvāpi mahānubhāvā vṛṣṇyandhakāḥ kuravaśca pāṇḍavāśca |
divy37:342: saṁpannacittā yaśasā jvalantas te na śaktā maraṇaṁ nopagantum (29)|
divy37:343: na samyamena tapasā na rājan na karmaṇā na rājan na karmaṇā vīryaparākrameṇa vā |
divy37:344: na vittapūgair na dhanairudāraiḥ śakyaṁ kadācinmaraṇādvimoktam (30)|
divy37:345: naivāntarīkṣe na samudramadhye na parvatānāṁ vivaraṁ praviśya |
divy37:346: na vidyate sa pṛthivīpradeśo yatra sthitaṁ na prasaheta mṛtyuḥ (31)|
divy37:347: naivāntarīkṣe na samudramadhye na parvatānāṁ vivaraṁ praciśya |
divy37:348: na vidyate sa pṛthivīpradeśo yatra sthitaṁ na prasaheta karma (32)|
divy37:352: śaṅkhavarṇāni śīrṣāṇi tāni dṛṣṭveha kā ratiḥ (34)|
divy37:359: purā hi tvāṁ vyāghra iva mṛgaṁ nihatya vyādhirjarā karṣati antakaśca |
divy37:360: na te mitrāṇyapaneṣyanti rogaṁ saṁgamya sodaryagaṇāśca sarve (38)|
divy37:361: yadeva labdhādhikamasya bhavati dhanaṁ dhānyaṁ rajataṁ jātarūpam |
divy37:363: sacedṛṇaṁ bhvati piturmṛtasya priyāḥ sutā nāsya vahṇiṁ viśanti mṛtyau na vāpyaśrumukhā rudanti rāhuḥ pitā mama kāryateti(?) (40)|
divy37:364: āyāntu sattvāḥ pitā mameti prakīrṇakeśāśrumukhā rudanti |
divy37:365: jyotiścāsya purato haranti hyaho batāyamamaro bhavediti (41)|
divy37:366: dūṣyairenaṁ prāvṛtaṁ nirharanti jyotiḥ samādāya ca tam dahanti |
divy37:367: sa dahyate jñātibhī rudyamāna ekena vastreṇa vihāya bhogam (42)|
divy37:368: eko hyayaṁ jāyate jāyamānastathā mriyate mriyamāṇo ’yamekaḥ |
divy37:369: eko duḥkhānanubhavatīha jantur na vidyate saṁsarataḥ sahāyaḥ (43)|
divy37:370: etacca dṛṣṭveha parivrajanti kulāyakāste na bhavanti santaḥ |
divy37:373: atha bimbisāro rājā rudrāyaṇena bhikṣuṇā uttarottareṇa pratibhānena nirākṛtastūṣṇīṁ niṣpratibhaḥ prakrāntaḥ |
divy37:375: atha śikhaṇḍī rājā yāvatkaṁciddharmeṇa rājyaṁ kārayitvā adharmeṇa rājyaṁ kārayitumārabdhaḥ |
divy37:376: sa hirubhirukābhyāmuktah—deva, dharmeṇa rājyaṁ kāraya, mā adharmeṇa |
divy37:378: tadyathā deva puṣpavṛkṣāḥ phalavṛkṣāśca kālena kālaṁ samyakparipālyamānā anuparataprayogeṇa yathākālaṁ puṣpāṇi phalāni cānuprayacchanti, evameva janapadāḥ pritipālyamānā anuparataprayogeṇa yathākālaṁ karapratyāyānanuprayacchantīti |
divy37:379: sa tābhyāṁ nivārito yāvattāvaddharmeṇa rājyaṁ kārayitvā punarapyadharmeṇa rājyaṁ kārayitumārabdhaḥ |
divy37:383: ruṣito ’mātyānāmantrayate—yo bhavanto rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya yāvat trirapyājñāṁ prativahati, tasya kīdṛśo daṇḍa iti |
divy37:384: tatra kecidduṣṭāmātyāḥ kathayanti—deva, kimatra jñātavyam? tasya vadho daṇḍa iti |
divy37:385: gāthe ca bhāṣante— amātyasya ca duṣṭasya dantasya calitasya ca |
divy37:388: kośasthaṁ ca balasthaṁ ca yo na hanyātsa ghātyate (43)|
divy37:390: śikhaṇḍī rājā kathayati—bhavantaḥ, mamaitau pitrā saṁnyastau |
divy37:392: kiṁ tvābhyāṁ mama darśanapathe na sthātavyamiti |
divy37:395: tau kathayatah—deva, nākranditā nāluñcitā nātaptā notpīḍitāstilāstailaṁ prayacchanti, tadvannarapate janapadā iti |
divy37:401: dharmeṇa vā kārayati svarājyaṁ na cāsya kaścitparatopasargaḥ (47)|
divy37:403: sa kathayati— tathyaṁ śikhaṇḍī khalu raurukeṣu sabhṛtyavargo balavānarogaḥ |
divy37:404: na cāsya kaścitparatopasargo adharmeṇa tu rājyaṁ karoti nityam (48)|
divy37:405: athāyuṣmān rudrāyaṇo ’nupūrvyā praṣṭumārabdhah—kastatrāmātyapradhānah? kasya śikhaṇḍī vaśena janapadān pīḍayatīti? sa kathayati—deva, hirubhirukayoramātyayordvāraṁ nivārya anyau duṣṭāmātyau sthāpitau |
divy37:407: rudrāyaṇaḥ kathayati—gaccha tvaṁ bhoḥ puruṣa, raurukanivāsinaṁ janakāyaṁ samāścāsaya |
divy37:410: sa vaṇik paṇyaṁ visarjayitvā pratipaṇyamādāya saṁprasthito ’nupūrveṇa raurukamanuprāptaḥ |
divy37:411: tena jñātīnāṁ rahasi niveditam—bhavantaḥ, ahaṁ paṇyamādāya rājagṛhaṁ gataḥ |
divy37:413: sa kathayati—ahaṁ pracāritaṁ raurukaṁ gamiṣyāmi, śikhaṇḍinaṁ cāhitānnivārayiṣyāmi, hite ca saṁniyojayiṣyāmi yathā janapadānna pīḍayatīti |
divy37:415: evaṁ karṇaparamparayā sa śabdastayorduṣṭāmātyayoḥ karṇaṁ gataḥ |
divy37:416: tau saṁlakṣayatah—yadi vṛddharājā āgamiṣyati, niyatamasau bhūyo hirubhirukāvagrāmātyau sthāpayiṣyati, āvayoścānarthaṁ kārayiṣyati |
divy37:417: tadupāyasaṁvidhānaṁ ca kartavyam yenāsavantarmārga eva praghātyata iti |
divy37:418: tābhyāṁ rājñaḥ śikhaṇḍina ārocitam—deva, śrūyate vṛddharājā āgacchatīti |
divy37:420: kimarthaṁ tasyāgamanaprayojanamiti? tau kathayatah—deva, yenaikadivasamapi rājyaṁ kāritam, sa vinā rājyenābhiraṁsyata iti kṛta etat? punarapyasau rājyaṁ kārayitukāma iti |
divy37:421: śikhaṇḍī kathayati—yadyasau rājā bhaviṣyati, ahaṁ sa eva kumāraḥ |
divy37:422: ko nu virodha iti? tau kathayatah—deva, apratirūpametat |
divy37:423: kathaṁ nāma kumārāmātyapaurajanapadairañjalisahasrair namasyamānena rājyaṁ kārayitvā punarapi kumāravāsena vastavyam? varaṁ deśaparityāgo na tu kumāravāsena vāsam |
divy37:424: tadyathāpi nāma puruṣo hastigrīvāyāṁ gatvā aśvapṛṣṭhena gacchet,aśvapṛṣṭhena gatvā rathena gacchet, rathena gatvā pādābhyāmeva gacchet, evameva rājyaṁ kārayitvā punaḥ kumāravāsena vāsa iti |
divy37:425: sa tābhyāṁ vipralabdhaḥ kathayati—kimatra yuktam? kathaṁ pratipattavyamiti? tau kathayatah—deva, praghātayitavyo ’sau |
divy37:426: yadi na praghātyate, niyataṁ duṣṭāmātyavigrāhito devaṁ praghātayatīti |
divy37:427: sa evamukte hīnadīnavadano mūhūrtaṁ tūṣṇīṁ sthitvā bāṣpoparudhyamānahṛdayaḥ karuṇadīnavilambitairakṣaraiḥ sa kathayati—bhavantau, kathaṁ pitaraṁ praghātayāmīti? tau kahtayatah—na devena śrutam? pitā vā yadi vā bhrātā putro vā svāṅganiḥsṛtaḥ |
divy37:433: anyatrāpyuktam— tyajedekaṁ kulasyārthe grāmasyārthe kulaṁ tyajet |
divy37:438: yadi devo ’tra vilambate, yaddevasyānuraktāḥ kumārāmātyapaurajanapadāste kṣobhamāpannā niyatamanarthaṁ kurvantīti |
divy37:439: kāmān khalu pratisevamānasya nāsti kiṁcitpāpaṁ karmākaraṇīyamiti tenādhivāsitam—evaṁ kriyatāmiti |
divy37:440: tau duṣṭāmātyau hṛṣṭatuṣṭau pramuditau vadhakapuruṣānutsāhayatah—bhavantaḥ, gacchata, vṛddharājaṁ praghātayata |
divy37:444: tābhyāṁ te hiraṇyasuvarṇagrāmapradānādinā protsāhitā na pratipadyante |
divy37:445: tatastābhyāṁ krodhaparyavasthitābhyāṁ cārapālānāmājñā dattā—gacchantu, bhavantah etān puruṣān saputradārān sasuhṛtsambandhibāndhavāṁścārake baddhvā sthāpayateti |
divy37:446: te śrutvā bhītāḥ saṁpratipannāḥ kathayanti—deva, alaṁ krodhena |
divy37:450: āyuṣmānapi rudrāyaṇastrayāṇāṁ māsānāmatyayātkṛtacīvaro niṣṭhitacīvaraḥ samādāya pātracīvaram yena bhagavāṁstenopasaṁkrāntaḥ |
divy37:451: upasaṁkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantamidamavocat—icchāmyahaṁ bhadanta raurukaṁ nagaraṁ janapadacārikāṁ caritumiti |
divy37:453: athāyuṣmān rudrāyaṇo bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato ’ntikāt prakrāntaḥ |
divy37:454: āyuṣmān rudrāyaṇastasyā eva rātreratyayāt pūrvāhne nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya rājagṛhaṁ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat |
divy37:455: rājagṛhaṁ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātraḥ pratikrānto yathāparibhuktaṁ śayanāsanaṁ pratisāmayya samādāya pātracīvaraṁ karmabalapreritam— dūraṁ hi karṣate karma dūrātkarma prakarṣate |
divy37:456: tatra prakarṣate jantum yatra karma vipacyate (52)|
divy37:457: iti yena raurukaṁ tena cārikāṁ prakrāntaḥ |
divy37:458: anupūrveṇa cārikāṁ carannantarmārge ’nyatamaṁ karvaṭakaṁ piṇḍāya praviṣṭaḥ |
divy37:463: sa taiḥ puruṣaiḥ sārdhamekasminnevodyāne rātriṁdevā samupagataḥ |
divy37:464: sa tān praṣṭumārabdhah— kaccicchikhaṇḍī khalu raurukeṣu sabhṛtyavargo balavānarogaḥ |
divy37:465: dharmeṇa vā kārayati svakaṁ rājyaṁ na cāsya kaccitparatopasargaḥ (53)|
divy37:467: te kathayanti— deva, tathyaṁ śikhaṇḍī khalu raurukeṣu sabhṛtyavargo bakavānarogaḥ |
divy37:468: na cāsya kaścitparatopasargah adharmarājyaṁ tu karoti nityam (54)|
divy37:469: naravara yattava sadṛśaṁ kṛtaṁ tvayā āryaparābhavacihnakaram |
divy37:470: tasyāpi tu yatsadṛśaṁ tadadya upalapsyase saubhyeti (55)|
divy37:471: āyuṣmān rudrāyaṇaḥ kathayati—bhavantaḥ, kimasau mama tatra gamanaṁ nābhinandatīti? te kathayati—deva, nābhinandatīti |
divy37:472: sa kathayati—bhavantaḥ, yadevaṁ na gacchāmi, pratinivartāmīti |
divy37:473: te gāthāṁ bhāṣante— kva yāsyasi tvaṁ naravīra bhūyo na te suto nandati jīvitena |
divy37:477: āyuṣmān rudrāyaṇaḥ kathayati—bhavantaḥ, yūyaṁ nāma mama vadhakapuruṣāh? deva, vadhakapuruṣāḥ |
divy37:478: sa saṁlakṣayati—yattaduktaṁ bhagavatā karmasvakatā te rudrāyaṇa manasikartavyeti, idaṁ tat |
divy37:479: sarvathā dhik saṁsārabhaṅguramiti viditvā teṣāṁ kathayati—bhadramukhāḥ, ahamasmi yadarthaṁ pravajitaḥ, so ’rtho mayā na saṁprāptaḥ |
divy37:481: te parasparaṁ saṁjalpaṁ kṛtvā kathayanti—deva, evaṁ kuru |
divy37:482: athāyuṣmān rudrāyaṇo ’nyatamaṁ vṛkṣamūlaṁ niśritya suptoragarājabhogaparipiṇḍataṁ paryaṅkaṁ baddhvā śānteneryāpathenāvasthitaḥ |
divy37:483: uktaṁ bhagavatā—pañcānuśaṁsā bāhuśrutye—skandhakuśalo bhavati dhātukuśala āyatanakuśalaḥ pratītyasamutpādakuśalaḥ, aparapratibaddhā cāsya bhavatyavavādānuśāsanīti |
divy37:484: tena vīryamārabhya idameva pañcagaṇḍakaṁ saṁsāracakraṁ calācalaṁ viditvā sarvasaṁskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṁsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṁ sākṣātkṛtam |
divy37:485: arhan saṁvṛttastraidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisavitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparānmukhaḥ |
divy37:487: athāyuṣmān rudrāyaṇo ’rhattvaprāpto vimuktiprītisukhapratisaṁvedī tasyā velāyāṁ gāthāṁ bhāṣate— mukto granthaiśca yogauśca śalyair nīvaraṇaistathā |
divy37:490: ityuktvā tān vadhakapuruṣānuvāca—bhadramukhāḥ, yaṁ mayā prāptavyaṁ tatprāptam |
divy37:492: te kathayati—deva, yadi śikhaṇḍī rājā asmān pṛcchati—kiṁ vṛddharājena maraṇasamaye vyākṛtamiti, kimasmābhirvaktavyam? bhadramukhāḥ, sa vaktavyah— bahvapuṇyaṁ prasavase rājyahetoḥ piturvadhāt |
divy37:493: ahaṁ ca parinirvāsye tvaṁ cāvīciṁ gamiṣyasi (58)|
divy37:495: idaṁ cāparaṁ vaktavyah—dve ānantarye karmaṇī kṛte—yacca pitā jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ, yaccārhan bhikṣuḥ kṣīṇāśravaḥ |
divy37:497: atyayamatyayato deśaya, apyetatkarma tanutvaṁ parikṣayaṁ paryādānaṁ gacchediti |
divy37:500: yam yam ṛddhyupāyaṁ prārabhate, tasya dharmavinaṣṭatvād ṛkaro ’pi na pratibhāti prāgeva ṛddhiḥ |
divy37:501: tatasteṣāmekena puruṣeṇa nirghṛṇahṛdayena tyaktaparalokena kakṣādasiṁ niṣkṛṣya utkṛttamūlaṁ śiraḥ kṛtvā pṛthivyāṁ nipātitaḥ |
divy37:504: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṁ prāviṣkurvanti, tasmin samaye nīlapītakohitāvadātā arciṣo mukhānniścārya kāścidadhastādgacchanti, kāścidupariṣṭādgacchanti |
divy37:505: yā adhastādgacchanti, tāḥ saṁjīvaṁ kālasūtraṁ saṁghātaṁ rauravaṁ mahārauravaṁ tapanaṁ pratāpanamavīcimarbudaṁ nirarbudamaṭaṭaṁ hahavaṁ huhuvamutpalaṁ padman mahāpadmaṁ narakaṁ gatvā ye uṣṇanarakāsteṣu śītībhūtvā nipatanti, ye śītanarakāsteṣūṣpībhūtvā nipatanti |
divy37:507: teṣāmevaṁ bhavati—kiṁ nu vayaṁ bhavanta itaścyutāḥ, āhosvidanyatropapannā iti |
divy37:509: teṣāṁ nirmitaṁ dṛṣṭvaivaṁ bhavati—na hyeva vayaṁ bhavanta itaścyutāḥ, nāpyanyatropapannāḥ |
divy37:512: te nirmite cittamabhiprasādya taṁ narakanivedanīyaṁ karma kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisaṁdhiṁ gṛhṇanti yatra satyānāṁ bhājanabhūtā bhavanti |
divy37:513: yā upariṣṭādgacchanti, tāścāturmahārājikāṁstrāyastriṁśān yāmāṁstuṣitānnirmāṇaratīn parinirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikān brahmapurohitān brahmapārṣadyān mahabrahmaṇaḥ parīttābhānapramāṇābhānābhāsvarān parīttaśubhānapramāṇaśubhāñchubhakṛtsnānanabhrakān puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalānabṛhānatapān sudṛśān sudarśanānakaniṣṭhān devān gatvā anityaṁ duḥkhaṁ śūnyamanātmetyuddhoṣayanti |
divy37:514: gāthādvayaṁ ca bhāṣante— ārabhadhvaṁ niṣkrāmata yujyadhvaṁ buddhaśāsane |
divy37:518: atha tā arciṣastrisāhasramahāsāhasraṁ lokaghātumanvāhiṇḍya bhagavantameva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti |
divy37:519: tadyadi bhagavānatītaṁ karma vyākartukāmo bhavati, bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhato ’ntardhīyante |
divy37:531: atha tā arciṣo bhagavantaṁ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavataḥ pādatale ’ntarhitāḥ |
divy37:532: athāyuṣmānānandaḥ kṛtakarapuṭo bhagavantaṁ papraccha— nānāvidho raṅgasahasracitro vaktrāntarānniṣkasitaḥ kalāpaḥ |
divy37:534: gāthāṁ ca bhāṣate— vigatodbhavā dainyamadaprahīṇā buddhājagatyuttamahetubhūtāḥ |
divy37:536: tatkālaṁ svayamadhigamya dhīra buddyā śrotṛrṇāṁ śramaṇa jinendra kāṅkṣitānām |
divy37:539: yasyārthe smitamupadarśayanti dhīrāstaṁ śrotuṁ samabhilaṣanti te janaughāḥ (64)|
divy37:542: nāhetvapratyayamānanda tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhāḥ smitaṁ prāviṣkurvanti |
divy37:543: api tvānanda, mukto granthaiśca yogaiśca śalyair nīvaraṇaistathā |
divy37:545: rudrāyaṇa ānanda arhattvaṁ prāpto jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ |
divy37:547: atha te vadhakapuruṣā āyuṣmato rudrāyaṇasya pātracīvaraṁ khikkhitaṁ cādāya raurukamanuprāptāḥ |
divy37:549: tau śrutvā prītiprāmodyajātau yena śikhaṇḍī rājā tenopasaṁkrāntau |
divy37:552: kathaṁ kṛtvā? yo devasya śatruḥ, sa praghātitaḥ |
divy37:554: kathaṁ jñāyate ’sau? praghātita iti? tābhyāṁ te vadhakapuruṣā darśitāh—deva, ime te badhakapuruṣā yaurasau praghātitaḥ |
divy37:555: śokhaṇḍanā rājñā te pṛṣṭāh—bhavantaḥ, kiyadvṛddharājasya balam |
divy37:556: deva, kutastasya balam? idaṁ pātracīvaraṁ khikkhiraṁ ceti |
divy37:557: śikhaṇḍī rājā mūrcchitaḥ pṛthivyāṁ nipatito jalapariṣekapratyāgataprāṇaḥ kathayati—bhavantaḥ, kiṁ vṛddharājena maraṇakāle vyākṛtam? deva, vṛddharājaḥ prāṇaviyogaḥ kathayati— bahvapuṇyaṁ prasavase rājyahetoḥ piturvadhāt |
divy37:558: ahaṁ ca parinirvāsye tvaṁ cāvīciṁ gamiṣyase (66)|
divy37:560: idaṁ cāparaṁ vaktavyah—dve tvayā ānantarye karmaṇī kṛte—yacca pitā jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ, yaccārhan bhikṣuḥ kṣīṇāśravaśca |
divy37:565: tena hirubhirukāvagrāmātyāvāhūtoktaubhavantau, na yuvābhyāmahamīdṛśakarma kurvāṇo nivārita iti? tau kathayatah—vayaṁ devenādarśanapathe vyavasthāpitāḥ |
divy37:566: kathaṁ nivārayāma iti? tena tau duṣṭāmātyau adarśanapathe vyavasthāpitau |
divy37:568: tābhyāmapi duṣṭāmātyābhyāṁ pracchannaṁ tiṣyapuṣyastūpayordve bale kṛtvā dvau biḍālapotakau sthāpitau |
divy37:569: tayordine dine māṁsapeśīrdattvā śikṣayatah—tiṣyapuṣyau,yena satyena satyavacanena yuvābhyāṁ māyayā lokaṁ vañcayitvā śraddhādeyaṁ vinipātya pratyavarāyāṁ biḍālayonāvupapannau, tena satyena satyavacanena māṁsapeśīṁ kṛtvā svakasvakaṁ stūpaṁ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya svakasvakaṁ balaṁ praviśatāmiti |
divy37:570: tau yadā suśikṣitau saṁvṛttau, tadā tābhyāṁ duṣṭāmātyābhyāṁ rudrāyaṇasya rājño devī uktā—devi, putraste kṛśāluko durbalako mlāno ’prāptakāyaḥ |
divy37:571: kimadhyupekṣasa iti? sā kathayati—kimahaṁ karomīti? yuvābhyāmevāsāvīdṛśakarma kārita iti |
divy37:572: tau kathayati—devi, yatra ghaaḥ patitaḥ, kiṁ tatra rajjurapi pātayitavyā? sā kathayati—satyametatpiturvadham |
divy37:575: sā tasya sakāśaṁ gatvā kathayati—putra, kasmātvamutpāṇḍūtpāḍuḥ kṛśāluko durbalako mlāno ’prāptakāya iti? sa kathayati—amba, tvamapyevaṁ kathayasi—kasmāttvamutpāḍūtpāṇḍuḥ kṛśāluko durbako mlāno ’prāptakāya iti, kathamahaṁ notpāṇḍūtpāṇḍuko bhavāmi kṛśāluko dubalako mlāno ’prāptakāya iti, yena mayā duṣṭāmātyavigrāhitena dve ānantarye karmaṇī kṛte—yacca pitā jīvitādvyaparopito yaccārhan bhikṣuḥ kṣīṇāśravah? ciramavīcau mahānarake vastavyamiti |
divy37:576: sā kathayati—putra, abhayaṁ tāvatprayaccha, yatsatyaṁ tatkathayāmīti |
divy37:578: sā kathayati—yathābhūtaṁ putra, nāsau tava pitā, kiṁ tu mayā ṛtusnātayā anyena puruṣeṇa sārthaṁ paricaritam, tatastvaṁ jāta iti |
divy37:580: iti viditvā kathayati—amba, yadyevaṁ pitṛvadho nāsti, athadvadho ’sti |
divy37:581: sa kathaṁ nistārya iti? sā kathayati—putra, jñānakocidāḥ praṣṭavyāḥ |
divy37:583: tayā tau duṣṭāmātyau āhūyoktau—mayā asya pitṛvadho vinoditaḥ |
divy37:585: śikhaṇḍinā rājñā amātyānāmājñā dattā, sarvāmātyān saṁnipātayata ye ca kecijjñānakovidā iti |
divy37:586: taiḥ sarvāmātyāḥ saṁnipātitāḥ, ye ca kecijjñānakovidāḥ |
divy37:589: tatra kecitkathayanti—deva, kenāsau dṛṣṭo ’rhattvam iti? apare kathayanti—deva, arhantaḥ sarvajñānakalpā ākāśagāmina iti |
divy37:590: tau duṣṭāmātyau kathayatah—deva, kimatra śokaḥ kriyate? sa kathayati—yuvāmapyevaṁ kathayatha—kimarthaṁ śokaḥ kriyate iti, nanu yuvābhyāmevāhamarhadvadhaṁ kātitaḥ |
divy37:592: kuto ’rhadvadhah? sa kathayati—mayā pratyakṣadṛṣṭau tiṣyapuṣyau arhantau jvalanatapanavarṣaṇavidyotanaprātihāryāṇi kṛtvā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau nirvātau |
divy37:593: yuvāmevaṁ kathayatha—na santyarhanataḥ, kuto ’rhadvadha iti? tau kathayatah—vayaṁ devasya pratyakṣīkurmo yathā māyayā lokaṁ vañcayitvā śraddhādeyaṁ vinipātya pratyavarāyāṁ biḍālayonāvupapannau adyatve ’pi stūpe tiṣṭhata iti |
divy37:594: rājā amātyānāmantrayate—bhavantaḥ, yadyevamāgacchata gacchāmaḥ, paśyāmaḥ kiṁ bhūtamabhūtaṁ veti |
divy37:595: eṣa ca śabdo rauruke nagare samantato visṛtaḥ |
divy37:597: tatastau duṣṭāmātyau kathayatah—yathā tiṣyapuṣyau yena satyena satyavacanena yuvāṁ māyayā lokaṁ vañcayitvā śraddhādeyaṁ vinipātya pratyavarāyāṁ biḍālayonāvupapannau svakasvake stūpe tiṣṭhataḥ |
divy37:598: anena satyena satyavacanena imāṁ māṁsapeśīmādāya svakasvakaṁ stūpaṁ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya svakasvakaṁ bilaṁ praviśatāmiti |
divy37:601: tau māṁsapeśīmādāya svakasvakastūpaṁ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya svakasvakabilaṁ praviṣṭau |
divy37:602: tau duṣṭāmātyau kathayata—dṛṣṭaṁ deveneti? sa kathayati—dṛṣṭam |
divy37:605: tasya yāsau dṛṣṭih—santi loke ’rhanta iti, sā prativigatā |
divy37:606: tatra ye ’śraddhāsteṣāmasaddarśanamutpannam, ye madhyasthāsteṣāṁ kāṅkṣā, ye śraddhāsteṣāmadbhutaṁ saṁvṛttam |
divy37:608: śikhaṇḍī rājā saṁlakṣayati—yadi na santyeva loke ’rhantaḥ, kimarhtamāryakāśyapasya kātyāyanasya pañcaśataparivārasya śaulāyā bhikṣuṇyāḥ plañcaśataparivārāyāḥ piṇḍakamanuprayacchāmīti? tena bhikṣūṇāṁ bhikṣuṇīnāṁ ca piṇḍapātaḥ samucchinnaḥ |
divy37:610: athāyuṣmān mahākātyāyanaḥ śaulā ca bhikṣuṇī vinayāpekṣayā tatraivāvasthatau |
divy37:612: āyuṣmāṁśca mahākātyāyano raurukaṁ nagaraṁ piṇḍāya praviśati |
divy37:615: dṛṣṭvā ca punarāmantrayate—bhavantaḥ, kimarthamayamāryo mahākātyāyano māṁ dṛṣṭvā ekānte ’pakramyāvasthita iti |
divy37:617: tau kathayatah—deva, āryo mahākātyāyanaḥ saṁlakṣayati—devaḥ kṛtakautukamaṅgalo gacchati, mā aprasādaṁ vedayiṣyati, duḥkhaṁ caradgacchati, karma kriyate, pātracīvarāṇi pāṁśunā avatariṣyatīti |
divy37:619: āyuṣmān mahākātyāyano raurukaṁ nagaraṁ piṇḍāya caritvā nirgacchati, rājā ca śikhaṇḍī praviśati |
divy37:621: śikhaṇḍī rājā kathayati—bhavantaḥ, pūrvamapyayamāryo mahākātyāyano māṁ dṛṣṭvā ekānte ’pakramyāvasthitaḥ, sāmpratimapi |
divy37:622: ko ’tra heturiti? tasya pṛṣṭhatastau duṣṭāmātyau gacchataḥ |
divy37:623: tau kathayatah—deva, eṣa kathayati—mā ahamasya pitṛmārakasya rajasā pravrajyāmīti |
divy37:626: sa kathayati—bhavantaḥ, yasyāhaṁ priyaḥ, so ’sya muṇḍakasya śramaṇakasyoparyekaikaṁ pāṁśumusṭiṁ kṣipatviti |
divy37:629: ekaikayā pāṁśumuṣṭyā āyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasyopari mahān pāṁśurāśirvyavasthitaḥ |
divy37:634: tau pṛcchatah—bhavantaḥ, kimidamiti? te kathayanti—tena kalirājena pitṛmārakeṇa āryo mahākātyāyano ’duṣyanayakārī pāṁśunā avaṣṭabdha iti |
divy37:635: tau sāśrukaṇṭhau rudanmukhau gopālakapaśupālakaiḥ sārdhaṁ pāṁśūnapanetumārabdhau |
divy37:637: tau pādayor nipatya pṛcchatah—ārya, kimidamiti? sa kathayati—kimanyadbhaviṣyatīti? tau kathayatah—ārya, yadidaṁ śikhaṇḍinā mahākātyāyane janakāyasahāyena karma kṛtam |
divy37:639: itaḥ saptame divase raurukaṁ nagaraṁ pāṁśunā avaṣṭapsyate |
divy37:640: ārya, kā āvupūrvī bhaviṣyatīti? āyuṣmantau, prathame divase mahāvāyurāgatya raurukaṁ nagaramapagatapāṣāṇaśarkarakapālaṁ vyavasthāpayiṣyati |
divy37:642: tṛtīye vastravarṣam, caturthe hiraṇyavarṣam, pañcame suvarṇavarṣam, paścādyai raurukasāmāntanivāsibhiḥ sāmavāyikaṁ karma kṛtam, te raurukaṁ nagaraṁ prevakṣyanti |
divy37:643: teṣu praviṣṭeṣu ṣaṣṭhe divase ratvavarṣaṁ patiṣyati, saptame divase pāṁśuvarṣamiti |
divy37:644: tau kathayatah—ārya, kimāvāmasya karmaṇo bhāvinau? bhadramukhau, na yuvāmasya karmaṇo bhāginau |
divy37:645: ārya, yadevaṁ kathamasmābhirasmānnagarānniṣkramitavyamiti? sa kathayati—yuvām yāvacca gṛham yāvacca nadī atrāntare suruṅgāṁ khānayitvā gṛhasamīpe nāvaṁ sthāpayitvā tiṣṭhata |
divy37:646: yadā ratnavarṣaṁ patet, tadā ratnānāṁ nāvaṁ pūrayitvā niṣpalāyitavyamiti |
divy37:647: tau tasya pādayor nipatya raurukaṁ praviṣṭau |
divy37:648: rājñaḥ sakāśaṁ praviṣṭau kathayatah—kiṁ devenāryo mahākātyāyanaḥ kiṁciduktaḥ pāṁśunāvaṣṭabdhah? sa kathayati—bhavantaḥ, jīvatyasau? deva, jīvati |
divy37:649: kiṁ kathayati—deva, evaṁ kathayati—itaḥ saptame divase raurukaṁ nagaraṁ pāṁśunā avaṣṭapsyata iti |
divy37:650: kānupūrvī? kathayati—deva, sa evaṁ kathayati, prathame tāvaddivase mahavāyurāgatya raurukaṁ nagaramapagatapāṣāṇaśarkarakapālaṁ vyavasthāpayiṣyati, dvitīye divase puṣpavarṣaṁ patiṣyati, tṛtīye divase vastravarṣam, caturthe hiraṇyavarṣam, pañcame suvarṇavarṣam, paścādyai raurukasāmantakanivāsibhiḥ sāmavāyikaṁ karma kṛtaṁ te raurukaṁ nagaraṁ pravekṣyanti, teṣu praviṣṭeṣu ṣaṣṭhe divase ratnavarṣaṁ patiṣyati, saptame divase pāṁśuvarṣamiti |
divy37:651: tau kathayatah—ārya, kimāvāmapyasya karmaṇo bhāginau? bhadramukhau, na yuvāmasya karmaṇo bhāginau |
divy37:652: ārya, yadyevaṁ kathamasmānnāgrānniṣkramitavyamiti? sa kathayati—yuvām yāvacca gṛham yāvacca nadī atrāntare suruṅgāṁ khānayitvā gṛhasamīpe nāvaṁ sthāpayitvā tiṣṭhata |
divy37:653: yadā ratnavarṣaṁ patet, tadā ratnānāṁ nāvaṁ pūrayitvā niṣpalayitavyamiti |
divy37:654: tau duṣṭāmātyau kathayatah—samucchinnapiṇḍapātaḥ pāṁśuvarṣeṇāvaṣṭabadhaḥ sa kimanyadvadatu? īdṛśaṁ vā vadate, devato vā pāpanaramiti(?) |
divy37:656: hirubhirukāvagrāmātyau mukhaṁ vibhaṇḍya hastān saṁparivartya prakrāntau |
divy37:659: hitukena śyāmāko dāraka āyuṣmate mahākātyāyanāya dattah—ārya, yadyasya kānicitkuśalamūlāni syuḥ, pravrājayethāḥ |
divy37:661: bhirukenāpi śyāmāvatī dārikā śailāyā bhikṣuṇyā dattā—ārye, yadyasyāḥ kānicit kuśalamūlāni syuḥ, pravrājayethāḥ |
divy37:662: no cet kauśāmbyāṁ ghoṣilo nāma gṛhapatirmama vayasyastasya samarpayiṣyasīti |
divy37:664: atha śailā bhikṣuṇī śyāmāvatīmādāya ṛddhyā raurukānnagarāt prakrāntā |
divy37:668: hirubhirukābhyāmagrāmātyābhyām yāvacca gṛham yāvacca nadī atrāntare suruṅgāṁ khānayitvā gṛhasamīpe ca nauḥ sthāpitā |
divy37:669: yāvadanyatamasmin divase mahāvāyurāgataḥ, yena taṁ raurukaṁ nagaramapagatapāṣāṇaśarkarakapālaṁ vyavasthāpitam |
divy37:671: tau duṣṭāmātyau kathayatah—deva, śrūyate rājño māndhātuḥ saptāhaṁ hiraṇyavarṣaṁ patitamiti |
divy37:674: tau duṣṭāmātyau kathayatah—devasyedaṁ vastravarṣaṁ patitam, nacirādvirāddhiraṇyavarṣaṁ patiṣyatīti |
divy37:676: tau duṣṭāmātyau kathayatah—devasyedaṁ hiraṇyavarṣaṁ patitam, nacirādeva suvarṇavarṣaṁ patiṣyatīti |
divy37:678: tau duṣṭāmātyau kathayatah—devasyedaṁ suvarṣaṁ ptatitam, nacirādeva ratnavarṣaṁ patiṣyatīti |
divy37:679: yau raurukasāmantakanivāsibhiḥ sāmavāyikaṁ karma kṛtam, te raurukaṁ nagaraṁ praviṣṭāḥ |
divy37:680: teṣu praviṣṭeṣu ṣaṣṭhe divase ratnavarṣaṁ patitam |
divy37:682: tatra hirukeṇānyatamasmin pradeśe hirukaṁ nāma nagaraṁ māpitam |
divy37:684: bhirukeṇānyatamasmin pradeśe bhirukaṁ nāma nagaraṁ māpitam |
divy37:688: śyāmākaḥ kathayati—ārya, kimeṣa uccaśabdo mahāśabda iti |
divy37:689: āyuṣmān mahākātyāyanaḥ kathayati—putra, vātāyanena kāśikāṁ niṣkāsayeti |
divy37:696: atha yā raurukanivāsinī devatā sā yenāyuṣmān mahākātyāyanastenopasaṁkrāntā |
divy37:700: āyṣmatā mahākātyāyanena śyāmāka uktah—putra, gṛhāṇa cīvarakarṇikam |
divy37:703: sa ṛddhyā uparivihāyasā śyāmākaṁ dārakamādāya saṁprasthitaḥ |
divy37:708: āyuṣmān mahākātyāyanaḥ śyāmākaṁ dārakaṁ khalabhidhāne sthāpayitvā pinṇḍapātraṁ praviṣṭaḥ |
divy37:710: yastatra puruṣo ’vasthitaḥ, sa taṁ dārakaṁ dṛṣṭvā tasya sakāśamupasaṁkramya kathayati—bho dāraka, tava prabhāvātkhalābhidhāne dhānyaṁ vardhata iti |
divy37:711: sa kathayati—na mama prabhāvāt khalabhidhāne dhānyaṁ vardhata iti, api tu raurukanivāsinī devatā ihāgatā amuṣmin pradeśe tiṣṭhati, tasyāḥ prabhāvāt khalābhidhāne dhānyaṁ vardhata iti |
divy37:712: sa tasyāḥ sakāśaṁ gatvā pādayor nipatya kathayati—devate, tāḍakaṁ kuñcikāṁ ca tāvaddhāraya, yāvadgrāmam gatvā āgacchāmi |
divy37:713: na ca tvayā māṁ muktvā anyasya kasyaciddātavyamiti |
divy37:714: tenāpi karvaṭakaṁ gatvā karvaṭakanivāsī janakāyaḥ saṁnipātitaḥ |
divy37:715: uktaśca—bhavantaḥ, raurukanivāsinī devatā ihāgatā khalābhidhāne tiṣṭhati |
divy37:717: tasyā haste mayā tāḍakaṁ kuñcikā ca dattā |
divy37:718: uktam ca—devate, tāḍakaṁ kuñcikāṁ ca tāvaddhāraya yāvad grāmaṁ gatvā āgacchāmi |
divy37:719: na ca tvayā māṁ muktvā anyasya kasyaciddātavyamiti |
divy37:720: tadadhiṣṭhānaṁ vijñāpayāmi—yadi mama putraṁ śreṣṭhinamabhiṣiñcatha, ahamātmānaṁ jīvitādvyaparopayāmīti |
divy37:721: devatā asmādadhiṣṭhānānna kvacidgamiṣyati, yuṣmākaṁ bhogābhivṛddhirbhaviṣyati, sarvāśca ītayo vyupaśamaṁ gamiṣyantīti |
divy37:723: tataḥ sarvaṁ tadadhiṣṭhānaṁ gandhapuṣpośobhitaṁ chatradhvajapatākāśobhitaṁ ca balimādāya yena devatā tenopasaṁkrāntāḥ |
divy37:724: upasaṁkramya pādayor nipatya kathayati—devate, adhiṣṭhā bhava, ihaiva tiṣṭheti |
divy37:727: āyuṣmān mahākātyāyana iti kathayati—devate, samanvāhara asya yasya sakāśāt tāḍakaḥ kuñcikā ca gṛhīteti |
divy37:730: tauryādṛśameva tasyā devatāyāḥ sthaṇḍilaṁ kāritaṁ tādṛśamevāyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasya |
divy37:731: tasyā devatāyā yo ’dhiṣṭhāne pradīpaḥ prajñaptaḥ, tamasau gṛhītvā āyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasya sthaṇḍile sthāpayati |
divy37:732: sā anyatamena puruṣeṇa prākārakaṇṭake sthitena pradīpaṁ gṛhītvā gacchantī dṛṣṭā |
divy37:733: sa saṁlakṣayati—eṣā devatā āryasya mahākātyāyanasyābhisātikā gacchatīti |
divy37:740: adhiṣṭhānanivāsinā janakāyena naimittikā āhūya pṛṣṭāh—kimetaditi? te kathayanti devatāprakopa iti |
divy37:742: sākathayati—yūyamāryasya mahākātyāyanasya nirāmagandhasyāsatkāramanuprayacchatheti? te bhūyaḥ kathayanti—kṣamakha devate, na kaścidasatkāraṁ kariṣyatīti |
divy37:744: te kathayanti—devate kṣamakha, prativiśiṣṭataraṁ kurma iti |
divy37:747: āyuṣmān mahākātyāyanastatra varṣoṣitaḥ śyāmākaṁ dārakamādāya devatāmupāmantrya saṁprasthitaḥ |
divy37:748: sā kathayati—ārya, mama kiciccihnamanuprayaccha, yatrāhaṁ kārāṁ kṛtvā tiṣṭhāmīti |
divy37:750: tayātra prakṣipya stūpaḥ pratiṣṭhāpito mahaśca prasthāpitah—kāśīmaha kāśīmaha iti saṁjñā saṁvṛttā |
divy37:753: tairlambate lambata iti uccair nādo muktaḥ |
divy37:754: tasmiñ janapade manuṣyāṇāṁ lambakapāla iti saṁjñā saṁvṛttā |
divy37:756: tatra śyāmākaṁ dārakaṁ vṛkṣamūle sthāpayitvā piṇḍāya praviṣṭaḥ |
divy37:758: paurajānapadāḥ saṁnipatya kathayanti—bhavantaḥ, kaṁ rājānamabhiṣiñcāma iti? tatraike kathayanti—yaḥ puṇyamaheśākhya iti |
divy37:759: apare kathayanti—kathamasau prajñāyata iti? anye kathayanti—parīkṣakāḥ prayujyantāmiti |
divy37:765: tasya vṛkṣasya cchāyā asya śyāmākasya dāraksya kāyaṁ na vijahātīti |
divy37:766: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ saṁjalpitumārabdhāh—bhavantaḥ, ayaṁ puṇyamaheśākhyaḥ sattvaḥ, etamabhiṣiñcāma iti |
divy37:772: kimasya dārakasya rājñaḥ saṁvartanīyāni karmāṇi na veti |
divy37:774: sa kathayati—putra, pratīccha rājyam, kiṁ tu dharmeṇa te kārayitavyamiti |
divy37:782: sā āyuṣmantaṁ mahākātyāyanaṁ dṛṣṭvā kathayati—dṛṣṭvā cirasya bara putrakaṁ paśyāmi, cirasya bata putrakaṁ paśyāmīti |
divy37:786: tasyā āyuṣmatā mahākātyāyanenāśayānuśayaṁ dhātuṁ prakṛtiṁ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasamprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā, yāṁ śrutvā viṁśatiśikharasamudgataṁ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṁ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā srotāpattiphalaṁ sākṣātkṛtam |
divy37:787: sā dṛṣṭasatyā trirudānamudānayati sma—idamasmākaṁ bhadanata na mātrā kṛtaṁ na pitrā na rājñā na devatābhir neṣṭena svajanabandhuvargeṇa na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇairyadbhavatā asmākaṁ kṛtam |
divy37:788: smucchoṣitā rudhirāśrusamudrāḥ, laṅghitā asthiparvatāḥ, pihitānyapāyadvārāṇi, vivṛtāni svargamokṣadvārāṇi, pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ smo devamauṣyeṣu |
divy37:791: durgatibhyaḥ samuddhṛtya svarge ca te aham |
divy37:792: sthāpitā putra yatnena sādhu te duṣkṛtaṁ kṛtam (68)|
divy37:793: athāyuṣmān mahākātyāyanastāṁ bhadrakanyāṁ satyeṣu pratiṣṭhāpya kathayati—amba, avalokitā bhava, gacchāmīti |
divy37:794: sā kathayati—putra, yadyevaṁ mama kiṁcidanuprayaccha, yatrāhaṁ pūjāṁ kṛtvā tiṣṭhāmīti |
divy37:796: tayā stūpaṁ pratiṣṭhāpya sā tasmin pratimāropitā |
divy37:801: atha yā uttarāpathanivāsinī devatā, sā āyuṣmantaṁ mahākātyāyanamidamavocat—ārya, mamāpi kiṁciccihnamanuprayaccha, yatrāhaṁ pūjāṁ kṛtvā tiṣṭhāmīti |
divy37:802: sa saṁlakṣayati—uktaṁ bhagavatā madhyadeśe pule na dhārayitavye iti |
divy37:805: tayā sthaṇḍile kārayitvā te pratiṣṭhāpite itaścarasantisaṁjñā saṁvṛttā |
divy37:808: kiccitkuśalacaryeti? sa kathayati—āyuṣmantaḥ, kiṁcit sukhacaryā kiṁcidduḥkhacaryeti |
divy37:809: bhikṣavaḥ kathayanti—kiṁ sukhacaryā kiṁ duḥkhacaryeti? sa kathayati—yatsattvakāryaṁ kṛtam, iyaṁ sukhacaryā |
divy37:810: yad rājā śikhaṇḍī raurukanivāsī ca janakāya ahaṁ ca pāṁśunāvacṭabdhaḥ, hirubhirukau cāgrāmātyau kṛcchreṇa palāyitau, iyaṁ duḥkhacaryeti |
divy37:817: bhikṣavaḥ saṁśayajātāḥ sarvasaṁśayacchettāraṁ buddhaṁ bhagavantaṁ papracchuh—kiṁ bhadanta āyuṣmatā rudrāyaṇena karma kṛtam yenāḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule pratyājātah? bhagavataḥ śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṁ sākṣātkṛtam? arhattvaprāptaśca śastreṇa praghātita iti? bhagavānāha—rudrāyaṇena bhikṣuṇā karmāṇi kṛtānyupacittāni labdhasambhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayānyoghavatpratyupasthitānyavaśyambhāvīni |
divy37:819: ko ’nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣveva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni vipacyante śubhānyaśubhāni ca |
divy37:821: sāmagarīṁ prāpya kālaṁ ca phalanti khalu dehinām (69)|
divy37:823: bhūtapūrvaṁ bhikṣavo ’tīti^dhvani asti buddhānāṁ bhagavatāmutpāde pratyekabuddhā lola utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktāḥ khaṅgaviṣāṇakalpā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya |
divy37:825: tasya karvaṭakasya ca nātidūre udapānaṁ prabhūtānāṁ mṛgāṇāmāvāsaḥ |
divy37:826: tatrāsau lubdhakaḥ pratidinaṁ prabhūtān kūṭān pāśālepāṁśca pratikṣipati prabhūtānāṁ mṛgānāmutsādāya vināśāya anayena vyasanāya |
divy37:828: yāvadanyataraḥ pratyekabuddho janapadacārikāaṁ caraṁstaṁ karvaṭakamanuprāpto devatāyatane rātiṁdivā samupāgataḥ |
divy37:829: sa pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya taṁ karvaṭakamanuprāptaḥ |
divy37:831: tataḥ piṇḍapātamaṭitvā saṁlakṣayati—idaṁ devāyatanaṁ divā ākīrṇam |
divy37:832: bahiḥ karvaṭakasya śānte sthāne piṇḍapātaṁ velāṁ karomīti |
divy37:833: sa karvaṭakānniṣkramyedaṁ śāntamidaṁ śāntamiti yena tadudapānaṁ tenopasaṁkrāntaḥ |
divy37:834: upasaṁkramya pātrasnāvaṇamekānta upanikṣipya pādau prakṣālya hastau nirmādya pānīyaṁ parisrāvya śīrṇaparṇakāni samudānīya niṣadya bhaktaketyaṁ kṛtvā hastau nirmādya mukhaṁ pātraṁ ca pātraparisrāvaṇam yathāsthāne sthāpya pādau prakṣālya anyatamavṛkṣamūlaṁ niśritya suptoragarājabhogaparipiṇḍīkṛtaṁ paryaṅkaṁ baddhvā śānteneryāpathena niṣaṇṇaḥ |
divy37:836: atha sa lubdhakaḥ kālyamevotthāya yena tadudapānaṁ tenopasaṁkrāntaḥ |
divy37:840: kimatra kāraṇam yenādya ekamṛgo ’pi na baddha iti? |
divy37:845: sa saṁlakṣayati—ete pravrajitāḥ śāntātmāna īdṛśeṣu sthāneṣvabhiramante |
divy37:846: yadyadyāhamasya jīvitāpacchedaṁ na karomi, niyatameṣa mama vṛttisamucchedaṁ karoti |
divy37:848: tenāsau nirghṛṇahṛdayena tyaktaparalokena karākārasadṛśaṁ dhanurākarṇaṁ pūrayitvā saviṣeṇa śareṇa marmaṇi tāḍitaḥ |
divy37:849: sa mahātmā pratyekabuddhaḥ saṁlakṣayati—mā ayaṁ tapasvī lubdho ’tyantakṣataśca bhaviṣyati, upahataśca |
divy37:851: sa vitatapakṣa iva haṁsarāja uparivihāyasamabhyudgamya jvalanatapanavarṣaṇavidyotanaprātihāryāṇi kartumārabdhaḥ |
divy37:853: sa mūlanikṛtta iva drumaḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati—avatarāvatara sadbhūtadakṣiṇīya, mama kleśapaṅkanimagnasya hastoddhāramanuprayaccheti |
divy37:859: sa saṁlakṣayati—yanmayā anena pūtikāyena prāptavyaṁ tadidānīṁ śāntaṁ nirupadhiśeṣaṁ nirvāṇadhātuṁ praviśāmīti |
divy37:860: sa tasyaiva purastātpunargaganatalamabhyudgamya vicitrāṇi pratihāryāṇi vidarśya nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ |
divy37:864: tānyasthīni nave kumbhe prakṣipya śārīrastūpaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ |
divy37:866: gandhairmālyairdhūpaśca kumbhe kṛtvā pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṁ kṛtam—yanmayaivaṁvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye ’pakāro kṛtaḥ, mā ahamasya karmano bhāgī syām |
divy37:867: yattu kārā kṛtā, anenāhaṁ kuśalamūlenāḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jāyeyam, evaṁvidhānāṁ ca guṇānāṁ lābhī syām, prativiśiṣṭataraṁ cātuḥ śāstāramārāgayeyaṁ na virāgayoyamiti |
divy37:869: kiṁ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo ’sau tena kālena tena samayena lubdhakaḥ, eṣa evāsau rudrāyaṇo bhikṣuḥ |
divy37:870: yadanena pratyekabuddhaḥ saviṣeṇa śareṇa marmaṇi tāḍitaḥ, tasya karmaṇo vipākena bahūni varṣaśatāni bahūni varṣasahasrāṇi narakeṣu paktaḥ, tasminnapi codapāne saviṣeṇa śareṇa marmaṇi tāḍitaḥ, tenaiva ca karmāvaśeṣeṇaitarhyapyarhattvaprāptaḥ śastreṇa praghātitaḥ |
divy37:872: punarapi bhikṣavaḥ saṁśayajātāḥ sarvasaṁśayacchettāraṁ buddhaṁ bhagavantaṁ papracchuh—kiṁ bhadanta śikhaṇḍinā raurukanivāsinā janakāyenāyucmatā mahākātyāyanena ca karma kṛtam yena pāṁśunāvaṣṭabdhāḥ, hirubhirukau tvagrāmātyau niṣpalayitāviti? bhagavānāha—ebhireva bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni labdhasambhārāṇi prariṇatapratyayānyoghavatpratyupasthitānyavaśyambhāvīni |
divy37:874: ke ’nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bḥkṣavaḥ karmaṇi kṛtānyupacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣveva skandhadhātvāayataneṣu karmaṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhānyaśubhāni ca |
divy37:876: samagrīṁ prāpya kālaṁ ca phalanti khalu dehinām (70)|
divy37:879: sa tayā saha krīḍate ramate paricārayati |
divy37:880: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ |
divy37:881: punarasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayato dārikā jātā |
divy37:883: yā janmikā dārikāḥ, tāsām yācanakā āgacchanti |
divy37:885: asati buddhānāmutpāde pratyekabuddhā loke utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanasanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya |
divy37:887: yāvattayā dārikayā gṛhaṁ saṁmṛjya vāṭasyopariṣṭāt saṁkāraśchoritaḥ |
divy37:893: sā bhrātrā pṛṣṭā—kiṁ tvayādya kṛtam yena te yācanakā nāgatā iti |
divy37:898: yasyā yasyā yācanakā āgacchanti, sā sā tasya pratyekabuddhasyopari saṁkāram chorayatviti |
divy37:904: tasmin karvaṭake dvau gṛhapatī samakau prativasataḥ |
divy37:908: kiṁ manyadhve bhikṣavo yāsau dārikā yayā pratyekabuddhasyopari saṁkāraśchoritaḥ, eṣa evāsu śikhaṇḍī |
divy37:909: yo ’sau karvaṭakanivāsī janakāyaḥ, eṣa evāsau raurukanivāsī janakāyaḥ |
divy37:910: yadebhiḥ pratyekabuddhānāmupari pāpakaṁ dṛṣṭigaramutpannaṁ kṛtam, asya karmaṇo vipākena pāṁśunāvaṣṭabdhāḥ |
divy37:911: yo ’sau gṛhapatī yābhyāṁ nivāritam, etāvetau hirubhirukāvagrāmātyau |
divy37:913: yo ’sau dārikāyā bhrātā yena vipuṣpitam, eṣa evāsau kātyāyano bhikṣuḥ |
divy37:914: yadanena bipuṣpitaṁ tasya karmaṇo vipākena pāṁśunāvaṣṭabdhaḥ |
divy37:915: yadi tena na vipuṣpitam (cittam) na pāṁśunāvaṣṭabdho ’bhaviṣyaditi |
divy37:916: yadi tasya pāpakaṁ dṛṣṭigatamutpannamabhaviṣyat, kātyāyano ’pi bhikṣuḥ pāṁśunāvaṣṭabdho ’nayena vyasanamāpanno ’bhaviṣyaditi |
divy37:917: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṁ karmaṇāmekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ, ekāntaśuklānāmekāntaśuklaḥ, vyatimiśrāṇāṁ vyatimiśraḥ |
divy37:918: tasmāttarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇyapāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca, ekāntaśuleṣveva karmasvābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
